name: Stream Buddies
description:
Stream Buddies allows you to show your viewers on stream based on who is active in chat. Once viewers speak in chat they will appear on screen, where they can then customise their brawler or make them fight & steal from each other.

Featuring a stream champion mechanic, encouraging viewers to donate bits or subscribe to become the new champion!

You can see a full list of features your viewers can use at bit.ly/StreamBuddies

Note: 

  • Stream Buddies is an in-development product and will receive more updates over time. 
  • Stream Buddies currently only supports integration with twitch.tv streams.
